1 1
OBJECTIVE

8 3
You're a mischievious little cat who loves to wreak havoc.
Luckily for you, your owner's out on errands for the day. 
You have 8 minutes to wreak havoc across the house. What crimes will you commit??

Explore the rooms and figure out how to contribute some of your artistic flair.
You will accumulate Chaos Coins based on how clever your actions are.



1 1
CONTROLS

13 3

                                            Move Forward/Backward

                                            Turn Left/Right

                                            Jump

                                            Swat/Drop

                                            Adjust the Camera (Rotation)


To quit this menu, or to bring it up again during the game, press "i"
